actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to conduct studies and demonstration projects to develop incentives for economy in the administration of the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services while maintaining or improving the quality of health and medical care available under such programs.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to conduct studies and demonstration projects to streamline the administration of the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services (CHAMPUS). Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to conduct studies and demonstration projects to develop incentives for economy in the administration of the Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Uniformed Services while maintaining or improving the quality of health and medical care available under such programs.
